name: Glass Tower (itch)
description:
Glass Tower is my first solo free2play FPS based of the last 6 months of work.

It is a Rougelite FPS where the player must escape their prison inside of a glass tower before time runs out!

While donations are not needed they are very welcomed! I do ask if you are willing to donate that you consider checking out my Indiegogo and donating there.

It allows me to gain a better overall idea of the interest in Glass Tower

AND

It allows you a chance to get some perks back for a donation you were already giving. 

https://igg.me/at/glasstower/x/9595291#/

I'll continue to clean up and fix bugs on this Itch version regardless of what happens with the Indiegogo. Since this version will be it's own thing. 

I look forward to hearing what you all think about the game in the comments! :)

IMPORTANT NOTES

You can switch weapons with num 1-5

Sprint  = Left shift

Reload = R
